items.name: Delhi Style Matar Kulcha
items.description: A perfect winter comfort food from the state of Delhi. White peas cooked and mixed with spicy green chutney, tangy tamrind chutney, ginger, special spice mix, onion, tomatoes and fresh coriander. Served with 2 kulcha + achar + onions.

items.name: Dhaba Style Chicken Curry
items.description: A delicious dish from the northern part of India. Chicken cooked with onion, tomato, yogurt, ginger, garlic and chilles with lip smacking spices to make this dish something to die for!
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Ragada Pattice
items.description: Street food from India, small potato patty mixed with spices, shallow fried and then smeared with some tangy tamarind chutney and spicy green chutney, onions, coriander and spices. (2 tikkies)

items.name: Sambar rice mix
items.description: A comfort food from the South India. Lentil mixed with veggies, tamarind and sambar powder mixed with rice.

items.name: Hyderabadi Khatti Dal
items.description: A comforting dish from Hyderabad. Lentils cooked with tamarind and tempered with garlic, dry red chillies and cumin.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + papad + side salad + achar

items.name: Hyderabadi Lamb Korma
items.description: Spicy lamb curry looked with whole garam masala, cashew paste, yogurt and spices
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + papad + side salad + achar

items.name: Tandoori Aloo
items.description: Potatoes marinated in yogurt with spices and chilies, mint and coriander and then skewered and cooked on a grill pan. Served with a side of spicy green chutney. (3 skewers)

items.name: Palak Moong dal Kichidi
items.description: Comfort food made with lentils, rice, onion, tomato and spinach and topped with some ghee.

items.name: Bhuni Khichuri
items.description: Bengali style pulao. Lentils, rice & veggies fired together and cooked with spices in one pot and topped with bengali garam masala and fresh corriander. Served with side salad + achar + papad.

items.name: Kolkata style Chicken Dum Briyani
items.description: A flavorful rice dish made with tender chicken, potatoes, eggs, aromatic basmati rice, and a variety of spices. Slow-cooked in a sealed pot to infuse flavors and tenderize the chicken. Served with yogurt raita + achar + papad

items.name: Cheesy Paneer Bread Pockets
items.description: Grated Indian cottage cheese mixed with cheese, pepper and spices stuffed between bread and deep fried. (2 pockets)

items.name: Palak, Oats & Besan Cheela
items.description: Spinach puree mixed with oats and gram flour with different spices, corriander & chillies. (4 cheela)

items.name: Peshawari Chana
items.description: Chickpeas pressured cooked with whole spices and cooked in a base of onion tomato gravy with freshly made spice mix topped with fresh coriander.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Peshawari Chicken Curry
items.description: Chicken cooked with some fried onion, chillies, tomato & ginger-garlic paste; topped with some fresh garam masala & lime juice.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Paneer Schezwan Frankie
items.description: Spicy paneer cooked with chinese sauces, wrapped in roti with onion, cabbage and frankie masala. A perfect spicy snack. Served with schezwan chutney for an extra kick

items.name: Chicken Tehari
items.description: One pot chicken rice cooked with caramalised onion, tomato, ginger-garlic paste and fresh garam masala

items.name: Tawa Paneer Masala
items.description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in spicy flavourful gravy with onion, capsicum and fresh spices with fresh corriander.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Tawa Anda Masala
items.description: Hard boiled eggs pan fried and cooked in spicy flavourful gravy with onion, capsicum and fresh spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Cheese Corn Balls
items.description: Boiled potatoes mixed with cheese, paneer and green chillies coated with breadbrumbs and deep fried. Served with side of tomato ketchup. (6 pieces)

items.name: Pongal
items.description: Rice lentils pressure cooked together and tempered with different spices, curry leaves and cashew and served with a side of coconut chutney.

items.name: Arachuvitta Sambar
items.description: A dish from the state of Kerala. Veggies cooked with lentils and tamarind and homemade samabar powder and coconut. A dish very comforting for the soul.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Kerala Prawn Curry Roast
items.description: Shrimp curry made in a base of coconut milk with onions, ginger and garlic and tempered with mustard seeds and fresh curry leaves. A delicacy from Kerala.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Rajma Tikki
items.description: Shallow fried patty made with kidney beans mashed and mixed with onions, chillies, potatoes and a lot of different spices.  Served with a side of green chutney. (4 tikkies)

items.name: Rajma Chawal
items.description: Red kidney beans cooked in a flavourful gravy with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and spices and topped with fresh garam masala and coriander. Served with steamy rice and papad.

items.name: Manipur Style Chak Angouba
items.description: Vegetable pulao cooked with aromatic basmati rice and fresh spices. Served with some raita.

items.name: Mizoram Style Arsa Beipenek
items.description: A traditional recipe from the tribal part of Mizoram where the chicken is cooked in it's own broth and thickened with whole wheat flour.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Dahi Bhalle
items.description: A street food dish from Delhi. Fried lentil balls topped with chillied & spiced yogurt, spicy green chutney, sweet tangy chutney and crispy boondi. (3 bhalle)

items.name: Mor Kulambu
items.description: Pumpin cooked in a base of yogurt, chilli and coconut. A dish from the south of India. Served with rice.

items.name: Basanti Pulao
items.description: A fragrant rice dish with some rasins, cashewnuts and a unique touch of sugar to add sweetness to the dish. Served with a side of salan.

items.name: Kolkata style Lamb Biryani
items.description: Lamb biryani with juicy lamb pieces, potatoes and egg cooked with fragrant basmati rice, fresh coriander and mint. Served with a side of yogurt raita + papad

items.name: Thalipeet
items.description: Flatbread made of mixed grain flour with spices & onions. A very heathy meal served with tangy onion & tomato chutney. (4 thalipeet)

items.name: Puttu Kadala
items.description: Steamed rice flour cakes layered with coconut and served with spicy flavourful black chickpea curry.
